en_text: Like spit poison gas, or dance a mysterious dance?
jp_text: 毒霧を吹くとか　不思議な踊りを踊るとか
google_translated: If you blow poisonous mist or dancing a strange dance

en_text: I'll teach you to make a fool out of me!
jp_text: だいたい　あんたもあんたよ

en_text: Huh? Where am I?
jp_text: あれ？　ここは…

en_text: That's a lot of blood...
jp_text: すごい血

en_text: Am I gonna die?
jp_text: あたし死んじゃうのかな
google_translated: I wonder if I will die

en_text: No, wait! Don't move! Don't talk!
jp_text: いや待て　動くな　しゃべるな

en_text: I'll come to you!
jp_text: 今そっちに行くからな

en_text: Are you all right?
jp_text: 大丈夫なのか

en_text: I don't really know...
jp_text: よ…よく分かんない

en_text: What's this?
jp_text: なに　これ

en_text: Paint?
jp_text: 絵の具？

en_text: Yoshiki?
jp_text: ヨシキか

en_text: In other words, you guys were putting on an act like that to help out Gen-san, who lives here?
jp_text: つまりヨシキ君たちは

en_text: Right. Couples and delinquents come here often and pick on Gen-san.
jp_text: そうだよ　この病院カップルとかヤンキーがよく来て
google_translated: Yes, this hospital couple and Yankee come well

en_text: So we thought that if word got out the place was haunted,
jp_text: 幽霊が出るって噂が立てば
google_translated: If there is a rumor that a ghost will come out

en_text: those sorts of people would stop coming.
jp_text: そういう人たちが来なくなると思って
google_translated: I think such people will not come

en_text: It appears that it has actually had some effect.
jp_text: 実際　効果はあったようで　めっきり人も来なくなりました
google_translated: It seems that there was an actual effect and no plating came

en_text: Thank goodness.
jp_text: ありがたいことです

en_text: Well, to be sure, Mizuki ran off just seeing the old lady at the window.
jp_text: 窓のおばあさんだけで逃げちゃったもんね
google_translated: I just escaped with the grandmother of the window

en_text: What? Old lady?
jp_text: おばあさん？

en_text: You propped up an old lady next to the window, didn't you?
jp_text: 窓際におばあさんを立たせてたんでしょ
google_translated: I made my grandmother standing by the window

en_text: I don't know what you're talking about.
jp_text: そんなの　知らないよ

en_text: That...
jp_text: ああ　それですか

en_text: It's probably someone who died in the fire ten years ago.
jp_text: たぶん　10年前の火災で亡くなった方でしょう
google_translated: Maybe if you died in a fire 10 years ago

en_text: So they've finally gone home.
jp_text: やっと帰ってくれたね

en_text: We've lived a quiet life after Dad, the hospital director, died.
jp_text: 院長だった父さんが亡くなってからの
google_translated: After the father who was a director died

en_text: You said it.
jp_text: 起きたか

en_text: Yeah... put me down. I can walk now.
jp_text: 降ろして　もう歩ける
google_translated: Do not go down and walk anymore

en_text: When I fell and got all covered in sticky blood...
jp_text: あたしが落っこちて　ギトギトの血まみれになって
google_translated: I felt and become bloody of Gitogito

en_text: Huh?
jp_text: そうだな

en_text: Oh, nothing.
jp_text: いや　なんでもない

en_text: Hey, I couldn't hear you very well.
jp_text: ねえ　よく聞こえなかったんだけど
google_translated: Hey I couldn't hear it well

en_text: Don't worry about it. Just forget it.
jp_text: 気にするな　忘れろ

en_text: So, what was it you said just now?
jp_text: ねえ　今なんて言ったの

en_text: Chidori. I didn't say...
jp_text: 千鳥　俺はなにも…

en_text: Tell me!
jp_text: 言いなさいよ

en_text: I'll give you a taste of fear number two!
jp_text: {\fsp0}もう一回言わないと　たった今から第二の恐怖を味わわせるわよ
google_translated: I have to taste the second fear from now on once again

en_text: Cleaning a rugby ball? What's up with that, Sousuke?
jp_text: どしたの　宗介　ラグビーボールなんか磨いて

en_text: It looks like next time we're doing a rousing, touching sports story.
jp_text: 次回は熱血感動スポーツ巨編らしいのだ
google_translated: Next time it seems like a hot hemorrhagic sport huge

en_text: I received a recruit training manual from Mao.
jp_text: 任せろ　マオから新兵を扱くマニュアルをもらった
google_translated: Leave the manual to handle newer from Mao

en_text: Tune in next time for "The War Cry of Excessiveness."
jp_text: 次回　「やりすぎのウォークライ」　ご期待ください
google_translated: Next time, please expect "Walkrain of too much"

en_text: Gung Ho! Gung Ho! Gung Ho!
jp_text: ガンホー　ガンホー　ガンホー

en_text: By the way, why are you wearing naval attire?
jp_text: ところで　君はなぜ水兵の服を着ているのだ
google_translated: By the way, you are wearing a water soldier
